home.title: Home
home.description: My online portfolio (Thomas Fortin), in order to present my training, my experiences and my projects. This site also serves as a "lab" for me to experiment with new things.

homeStudies.title: My studies
homeStudies.catchPhrase: Here is an exhaustive list of my graduate studies !

homeExperiences.title: My experiences
homeExperiences.catchPhrase: Here is a non-exhaustive list of my last professional experiences !

homeCallToAction.title: Find me
homeCallToAction.catchPhrase: Do you want to find me on social medias or know more about my projects ? Here are the useful links. And if you want to find the source code of this project, it's publicly available on the following Github account !
